letras: I keep singing the same old song /n
When you left me, you left me in darkness /n
I was restless, a fool for your time /n
But now I've found me an angel of mercy /n
I don't feel bad at all /n  Your
body was honey, I tasted a lot /n  But
let me tell you babe, I need more than you got /n  I
want someone to hold me and keep me satisfied
